The second version of '''0.25 SURVIVAL TEST''' is a version of [[Survival Test]] released on September 3, 2009, at 16:15 UTC.<ref name="release">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A11:15:16 <Real> do arrows have increased damage now that they're limited, Notch?''" [...] "''A11:15:29 <08Notch> Real: Yes, in a few seconds. ;)''"</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Arrow JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Arrow]]s'''
* Now deal {{hp|7}} damage instead of {{hp|3}}.<ref name="release" />

== Trivia ==
*This version was released 2 minutes after 0.25 SURVIVAL TEST, making that version the shortest lived ''Minecraft'' version across all editions.
